error.bluetooth_integration_required: Bluetooth integration is required to configure Skelly Ultra
error.rest_server_unreachable: Cannot connect to Skelly Ultra REST server. Please ensure the server is running at the specified URL.
error.rest_server_error: REST server returned an error. Please check the server is running correctly.

data_description.server_url: URL of the Skelly Ultra REST server for live mode audio features (default: http://localhost:8765)
data_description.live_mode_pin: PIN code for pairing the Live Mode Bluetooth speaker. Note: This integration cannot automatically pair the device. You must manually pair using bluetoothctl on the host running the REST server (bluetoothctl -> pair <MAC> -> enter PIN when prompted). Default: 1234

server_warning.title: REST server not running
server_warning.description: The REST server could not be reached. The integration will work for basic control, but live mode will not be available. See documentation: {docs_url}

data.acknowledged: I understand that live mode will not be available

enable_classic_bt.name: Enable classic Bluetooth
enable_classic_bt.description: Make the Skelly Ultra expose a classic Bluetooth speaker to connect to for live mode.

play_file.name: Play file
play_file.description: Play a file from the device's internal storage by file index.

file_index.name: File index
file_index.description: The 1-based index of the file to play (must be at least 1).

stop_file.name: Stop file
stop_file.description: Stop a file that is currently playing on the device by file index.

file_index.name: File index
file_index.description: The 1-based index of the file to stop (must be at least 1).
